about.title: Our Mission
about.description: Mission Bay Puppy Rescue was founded in 2018 with a simple but powerful mission: every puppy deserves a loving home. We rescue puppies from high-kill shelters, provide necessary medical care and rehabilitation, and work tirelessly to match them with perfect families. Our comprehensive approach includes behavioral training, medical care, and ongoing support to ensure successful adoptions.
